          <title>
            <string language="en">The structures of iodine and diamond</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Strukturen des Jods und des Diamanten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les structures de l'iode et du diamant</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι δομές του ιωδίου και του διαμαντιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las estructuras del yodo y del diamante</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram compares between the molecular structure of iodine and the giant structure of diamonds.</string>
          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme compare entre la structure

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama compara entre a estrutura molecular
